item.title: We mean business
item.description:
We mean business

Ambassadors of Style is an entrepreneurship, technology and science innovation program that advances economic development in underprivileged areas through people development, workforce development and business acceleration.

item.title: Summer camp sessions help boost kids' use of science, technology, engineering and math programs
item.description:
Summer camp sessions help boost kids' use of science, technology, engineering and math programs

Using basic knowledge of circuits, her 9- to 12-year-olds were able to create and program musical bananas, paper remote controllers and even a workable dancing stage, where kids can sharpen their footwork by dancing to scrolling arrows on a screen that translate onto the dance pad.

item.title: How Samsung plans its phones
item.description:
How Samsung plans its phones

The S7 and S7 Edge have lots in common with the 6 from last year, whereas the S6 was a really big change from the 5. So first of all, could you tell me about why Samsung made such a big design change from the S5 to S6?

item.title: Office Cribs: 6 LA tech offices that'll give you office envy

item.title: Windows 10 anniversary update: The 10 best features
item.description:
Windows 10 anniversary update: The 10 best features

In honour of Windows 10's first birthday, Microsoft is releasing an anniversary update to the software this week. Available from August 2, the update is free and features a number of upgrades to Microsoft's PC software, including selfie login for websites and apps, and an unlocked Cortana.

item.title: 21 jobs where robots are already replacing humans
item.description:
21 jobs where robots are already replacing humans

Think your job is super-secure? Don't get too cozy.

item.title: China, Not Silicon Valley, Is Cutting Edge in Mobile Tech
item.description:
China, Not Silicon Valley, Is Cutting Edge in Mobile Tech

The future of online payments and engagements can be found at Liu Zheng's noodle shop in central Beijing. Liu Xiu'e, 60, and her neighbor, Zhang Lixin, 55, read about the noodle shop on WeChat. Then they ordered and paid for their lunches and took and posted selfies of themselves outside the restaurant, all using the same app.

item.title: This tiny little trinket is a must for Apple Watch owners
item.description:
This tiny little trinket is a must for Apple Watch owners

A handy little portable Apple Watch charger just hit Kickstarter this month and it's an impressive piece of kit. The Diskus is the first portable Apple-approved Apple Watch Charger. More importantly it does away with the 6-foot cable found on the official charger and replaces it with a micro USB port.
